title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 68.6 - Purchases by retailers in default
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 68.6 - Purchases by retailers in default

State Regulations

Subsequent to having been reported as delinquent by a
manufacturer or wholesaler via the Authority's Online Delinquent Management

System, no retail licensee shall purchase or accept any delivery of alcoholic
beverages except for cash until such time as he or she has received a release
in writing from the Authority or his or her name is removed from the delinquent
list. No wholesaler or manufacturer shall make any sale or delivery, except for
cash, to any retailer whose name is on the delinquent list unless the retailer
evidences a release in writing from the Authority. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
68.6

Amended

New

York State Register August 14, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 33, eff. 8/14/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
